remarks: Solution of a (scalar) linear equation.  (Contributed by BJ, 6-Jun-2019.)
statement:
bj-lineq.a $e |- ( ph -> A e. CC ) $.
bj-lineq.b $e |- ( ph -> B e. CC ) $.
bj-lineq.x $e |- ( ph -> X e. CC ) $.
bj-lineq.y $e |- ( ph -> Y e. CC ) $.
